fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 119.89 lakh crore compared with Rs 405.97 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 surged 243.65 points or 1.38% to settle at 17,854.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slumped 8.48% to 14.3975. Adani Enterprises, State Bank of India and Reliance Industries were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
